Title: Authorizes a monitor for the Rochester City school district
Summary: Authorizes a state monitor for the Rochester City school district to provide direct oversight of the fiscal policies, practices, programs and decisions of such school district.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the commissioner of education, in consultation with the comptroller to appoint a monitor to oversee the Rochester City school district and establishing the powers and duties of the monitor; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
